benchmark_details.name: EvoChart-QA
benchmark_details.overview: EvoChart-QA is a comprehensive and challenging benchmark for real-world chart understanding, featuring 650 distinct real-world charts and 1,250 expert-curated questions focused on chart comprehension.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance model capabilities in real-world chart comprehension by evaluating chart understanding through a diverse set of questions based on real-world charts.

data.source: 650 distinct real-world charts collected from 140 different websites.
data.annotation: Curated by human experts to focus on chart understanding.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation combines strict and flexible approaches to judge answer correctness.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better chart comprehension.
